billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

title: Limits certain rent increases by limited-profit housing companies
summary: Provides that no application or motion for an increase in the maximum rental per room for limited-profit housing company projects shall be entertained or acted upon for a period of two years from the date of any previous order of the commissioner or supervising agency for the increase of maximum rent affecting the same dwelling unless a shorter period is requested by the tenant organization or board of directors in a cooperative.

       AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to applica-
         tions  for increases in rental rates for limited-profit housing compa-
         nies

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 31 of the private housing finance law is amended by
    2  adding a new subdivision 1-a to read as follows:

    4  MOTION FOR AN INCREASE IN THE MAXIMUM RENTAL PER ROOM  SHALL  BE  ENTER-
    5  TAINED  OR  ACTED UPON UNDER THIS SECTION FOR A PERIOD OF TWO YEARS FROM

    7  FOR THE INCREASE OF MAXIMUM RENT AFFECTING THE SAME  DWELLING  UNLESS  A
    8  SHORTER  PERIOD  IS REQUESTED BY THE TENANT ORGANIZATION OR THE BOARD OF
    9  DIRECTORS IN A COOPERATIVE.
   10    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.
